author: TravisEz13
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/README.md

fedora 25 is EOL
ubuntu 17.04 is EOL

@anmenaga  brought up 17.04
#5984 brought up fedora 25

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
from @anmenaga 
>FYI: Ubuntu 17.04 reached End of Life on January 13, 2018.
The repositories have been moved to a different location and must be accessed differently.
This is the reason why I was getting apt-get update errors on 17.04 during package validation.
The supported upgrade path from Ubuntu 17.04 is via Ubuntu 17.10.
http://fridge.ubuntu.com/2018/01/17/ubuntu-17-04-zesty-zapus-reached-end-of-life-on-january-13-2018/

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
Summary:
Fedora 25 should be replaced with Fedora 27
Ubuntu 17.04 should be replaced with Ubuntu 17.10

title: Update readme.md and related installation docs
